title: Holiday's Extension, 25 Under 25 Rankings
description:
Brian Windhorst, Kevin Pelton and Bobby Marks discuss the Jrue Holiday extension and what that means for the point guard market in free agency. Plus, the annual 25 Under 25 rankings – Pelton and Marks talk about their lists and what went into their decision making process for some young stars. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
